conjurer:Affix.DESCRIPTION: Activates when a #ySummon in front of or behind this #ySummon that meets this condition's requirements is #yTriggered.
conjurer:Affix.NAME: Affix

conjurer:Aqua.DESCRIPTION: Playing [A-G] cards on targets with [conjurer:Aqua] increases damage they take and decreases damage they deal.
conjurer:Aqua.NAME: Aqua

conjurer:Back Affix.DESCRIPTION: Activates when a #ySummon behind this #ySummon that meets this condition's requirements is #yTriggered.
conjurer:Back Affix.NAME: Back Affix

conjurer:Blasted.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the start of turn. Removed at round end.
conjurer:Blasted.NAME: Blasted

conjurer:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Apply the last #yElemental #yDebuff you manually leveled up to an enemy. The first time each turn you level up an #yElemental #yDebuff manually, gain #b1 #yCharge.
conjurer:Charge.NAME: Charge

conjurer:Cooled.DESCRIPTION: Every #b{0} stacks increases damage taken from #yAttacks and #yOrbs by #b1, and reduces damage dealt by #b1. Removed at round end.
conjurer:Cooled.NAME: Cooled

conjurer:Elemental Debuff.DESCRIPTION: [conjurer:Ignis], [conjurer:Aqua], [conjurer:Ventus], [conjurer:Petra]. Playing cards on targets with these debuffs triggers #yReactions. Removed at the end of the round.
conjurer:Elemental Debuff.NAME: Elemental Debuff

conjurer:Elemental Mastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply #yElemental #yDebuffs, increase their stacks.
conjurer:Elemental Mastery.NAME: Elemental Mastery

conjurer:Flow.DESCRIPTION: During your turn, spend #b{0} [conjurer:Flow] to draw a card.
conjurer:Flow.NAME: Flow

conjurer:Front Affix.DESCRIPTION: Activates when a #ySummon in front of this #ySummon that meets this condition's requirements is #yTriggered.
conjurer:Front Affix.NAME: Front Affix

conjurer:Ignis.DESCRIPTION: Playing [A-B] cards on targets with [conjurer:Ignis] damages them at the start of their turn.
conjurer:Ignis.NAME: Ignis

conjurer:Lux.DESCRIPTION: [A-Y] #yElemental #yDebuff. Reactions on the target are multiplied.
conjurer:Lux.NAME: Lux

conjurer:Matter.DESCRIPTION: #yReactions grant #yMatter. Can be spent to level #yElemental #yDebuffs.
conjurer:Matter.NAME: Matter

conjurer:Petra.DESCRIPTION: Playing [A-R] cards on targets with [conjurer:Petra] grant you [Block].
conjurer:Petra.NAME: Petra

conjurer:Reaction.DESCRIPTION: Occurs upon playing a card with an #yAffinity that activates the target's #yElemental #yDebuff. This also grants #yMatter.
conjurer:Reaction.NAME: Reaction

conjurer:Stabilize.DESCRIPTION: Prevent a turn-based power from being reduced at the start of turn.
conjurer:Stabilize.NAME: Stabilize

conjurer:Umbra.DESCRIPTION: [A-P] #yElemental #yDebuff. Reactions on a non-#ySummon, non-boss target have a chance to instantly kill it.
conjurer:Umbra.NAME: Umbra

conjurer:Ventus.DESCRIPTION: Playing [A-O] cards on targets with [conjurer:Ventus] grants charges to be used during your turn to draw cards.
conjurer:Ventus.NAME: Ventus
